inclusion.criterion: thyroid pathology qualified for first-time bilateral neck surgery
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: unilateral thyroid pathology eligible for minimally invasive approach (MIVAT)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: high-risk patients ASA 4 grade (American Society of Anesthesiology)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: inability to comply with the scheduled follow-up protocol
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and has undergone multiple treatments, including XRT. They have worsening dysphagia for solids and poor oral intake.
